questions.question: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?

answers.answer: I don't know what to do with one million euro. There are a lot of possibilities. I will certeinly use a part of this amount for my studies and help my family. Because they spend a lot of moneys for me and i think it's normal to help them. I will use a another part of this amount for charity. I will use a part of my money for my hobbies and paid my extra-student life. In other word, for paid my beer. And the reste of the amount will be stock in my bank for my futur.
